projectGridLines.title: Project 1  Title: Growth and marketing
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1

Title: Growth and marketing

Description: The student will work in the marketing team of Progrowth to acquire new leads and implement latest growth marketing techniques. Social media marketing, digital marketing, content writing etc

Skill sets: Written and spoken communication, interest in growth marketing, digital marketing

Traits expectation: willing to learn, team worker

Expected learning: Learn to market digital products across the globe.

Specific courses required for project execution: principles of management, communication skills etc
